name: My Pet KETH
description:
If you die hit that replay button

------------------------------controls-------------------------------

arrow keys: sing (sing = happi)

A: health

S: sleep

W: burger

D: homecook

E: sleep in a box

-----------------------------tips---------------------------------------

happi = tired

not homecooking takes away hp

once your sleep hits 0 you cant do anything

sleep in a box drains health
